episodes.title: The Hyper Credulity of Guru Fandom
episodes.description:
Explore the astonishing levels of credulity among the fans of notable gurus and streamers like Andrew Tate, Andrew Huberman, and Hasan Piker. Just how credulous are they? Incredibly so. Join us as we delve into this depressing phenomenon.

episodes.title: An epidemic of Religious Hipsterism in the Gurusphere
episodes.description:
We consider why being religious seems to be so hot right now(!) in the Gurusphere.
